title: Magic Johnson, Lakers, and Jeanie Buss
itunes:title: Magic Johnson, Lakers, and Jeanie Buss
description:
Colin discusses Magic Johnson stepping down, the current state of the Los Angeles Lakers, the warning signs, and what owner Jeanie Buss should do going forward. Guests include Nick Wright, Chris Broussard, Bill Oram, and Ric Bucher.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
